text: Anthony Daniels (born 21 February 1946) is an English actor. He plays the droid C-3PO in the Star Wars series and he is the only person to appear in all 11 Star Wars films. Daniels was born in Salisbury, Wiltshire, England on 21 February 1946.Lubow, Arthur. "The Forces Behind Jedi: Making Movie History Took Lucas & Co. to the Outer Limits" , People, vol. 20, no. 6, 8 August 1983. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * * Multimedia Q&A; with Daniels from the BBC website for the Ghosts of Albion Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Wiltshire Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:People from Salisbury
title: Anthony Daniels
